ScenarioDef.label: Exiled
ScenarioDef.description: A stranded survivor with very enigmatic origins tries to escape a rimworld. There is nothing to help him in this endeavour, but his own abilities. The true testament of any rimworld survivor. \n\nTrue hardcore scenario. You will play for human race.

scenario.summary: An enigmatic survivor tries to escape from a hostile world, with nothing but his wits to help him.

li.text:
You are not sure how you got there. Maybe it was something you did to someone. Maybe you pushed your luck too hard. Whatever brought you there, it strangely feels like it was on purpose. Next to you lies a note, that says:

"I managed to sneak you out of there, but you need to leave this world ASAP. Best of luck." 

Tou don't know who wrote this, but it seems like you need to start a camp to survive.
